mapper.select: select qc.qna_comment_id, q.qna_id, u.user_id, u.id, u.name, q.major_id majorId, m.major_name majorName, q.subject, q.content, q.reg_date, q.hit from qna q, users u, major m, qna_comment qc where q.user_id = u.user_id and q.major_id = m.major_id and qc.qna_id = q.qna_id and qc.qna_id = #{qna_id}
